definition: "eight" component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 八[ba1]
one of the characters used in kwukyel, an ancient Korean writing system
(coll.) back (of a human or other vertebrate)
(coll.) back (of a human or other vertebrate)
back (of a human or other vertebrate)
the back of the human body

sentences.english: The most widely used polio vaccine contains a live virus.
sentences.chinese: 最广泛使用的脊灰疫苗含有活病毒。

sentences.english: This can make complex shaped castings without any draft or flash.
sentences.chinese: 它能制造没有拔模斜度和缝脊的复杂形状铸件。

sentences.english: In 2011, only four countries in the world remain polio-endemic.
sentences.chinese: 2011年，全世界只有四个国家仍有脊灰流行。

sentences.english: The dimethylcarbazole distribution in crude oil from Hui, Liu Structure Ridge(HLSR), the Pearl River Mouth basin, has displayed some regular changes.
sentences.chinese: 二甲基咔唑在惠流构造脊油藏中的分布具有规律性。

sentences.english: The Horn of Africa is again polio-free.
sentences.chinese: 非洲之角又一次摆脱了脊灰。

sentences.english: This is an architecture with classical Chinese garden style.
sentences.chinese: 中式园林建筑单层硬山卷棚垂脊顶。

sentences.english: Its tectonic environment may be the spreading ridge of a small oceanic basin at the start.
sentences.chinese: 其构造环境可能为小洋盆初始扩张时的扩张脊。

sentences.english: From the side, it shows a definite profile due to the prominence of the superciliary ridges.
sentences.chinese: 从侧面看，它显示了一个明确的轮廓由于眉骨脊突出。

sentences.english: In a plumulaceous feather, barb ridges grow straight without any helical movement.
sentences.chinese: 在绒羽上，羽枝脊则直直生长，不做螺旋形移动。

sentences.english: Objective To carry out prenatal gene diagnosis in a pedigree of infantile spinal muscular atrophy (SMA).
sentences.chinese: 目的对一婴儿型脊肌萎缩症家系进行产前基因诊断。

sentences.english: Mitochondria are usually long, tubular in shape with branched or unbranched cristae.
sentences.chinese: 线粒体长管状，具多个不分枝或分枝的脊。

sentences.english: A review of progress in mid—ocean ridge dynamics during recent years is given.
sentences.chinese: 对最近几年洋中脊动力学研究之进展给予综述。

sentences.english: We're gonna transect the great arteries at the sino-tubular ridge.
sentences.chinese: 我们要在窦管脊上横切大动脉。

sentences.english: We don't like the rim. The rim should be ridged.
sentences.chinese: 我们不喜好如许的盘边，盘边必需是脊状的。

sentences.english: In 2010, only four countries in the world remain polio-endemic.
sentences.chinese: 2010年，全世界只有四个国家仍有脊灰流行。

sentences.english: Struts are fixed to each side of the posts to provide further support to the ridge purloin.
sentences.chinese: 立柱两侧安有对角撑，作为对脊檩的进一步支承。

definition: sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
ilium/outermost bone of the pelvic girdle/Taiwan pr. [ka4]
kneecapping/to cut or smash the kneecaps as corporal punishment
